title: Dad charged after toddler accidentally shoots mom
content:
LAKE PLACID, N.Y. -
Police have charged a Lake Placid man in connection with a shooting.
Investigators say a 2-year-old boy got a hold of a loaded gun in his home at the Commons Way apartment complex Tuesday, and he accidentally shot his mother.
Erin Coffey, 24, was shot in the buttock and the bullet exited her abdomen. She has since been released from the hospital. The child was not harmed.
Now, the toddler's father faces charges. Jonathan Coffey, 23, of Lake Placid, is charged with criminal possession of a firearm, reckless endangerment and endangering the welfare of a child. Police say Coffey did not have a permit for the weapon, and they say they found a second loaded pistol in the home when they searched it.
Police say the couple's 11-month-old daughter was also present during the shooting.
